plot: A french private detective goes to Brazil to investigate on the disappearance of a women. Down in Rio, he meets a informant who take him to different places. But a strange feeling is spreading during his investigation in this city.
title: Carioca
plot_es: A french private detective goes to Brazil to investigate on the disappearance of a women. Down in Rio, he meets a informant who take him to different places. But a strange feeling is spreading during his investigation in this city.
plot_en: A french private detective goes to Brazil to investigate on the disappearance of a women. Down in Rio, he meets a informant who take him to different places. But a strange feeling is spreading during his investigation in this city.
